column1: How can you see into my eyes
column5: Leading you down into my core
column12: 我的心靈沉睡在冰冷的某處
column13: until you find it there and lead it back home.
column14: 直到你發現並帶它回家
column20: (我無法醒來) 喚醒我的內心
column25: Call my name and save me from the dark.
column26: 呼喚我的名字並從黑暗中拯救我
column32: (我無法醒來) 喚醒我的內心
column37: Save me from the nothing I've become.
column39: Now that I know what I'm without
column40: 現在我知道我失去什麼
column43: Breathe into me and make me real
column44: 給我呼吸並讓我真實存在
column52: (我無法醒來) 喚醒我的內心
column57: Call my name and save me from the dark.
column58: 呼喚我的名字並從黑暗中拯救我
column64: (我無法醒來) 喚醒我的內心
column69: Save me from the nothing I've become.
column76: 一個內心空無一物的狀態
column81: 我感到冷若冰霜若沒有你的撫慰
column86: Only you are the life among the dead.
column87: 只有你是我九死中的一生
column90: I can't believe I couldn't see
column93: 直到你發現並帶它回家
column94: but you were there in front of me
column96: I've been sleeping a 1000 years it seems.
column98: I've got to open my eyes to everything.
column109: (必定還有值得我活下去的事物)
column117: (我無法醒來) 喚醒我的內心
